moreBlocks.otherOffices: ReidGoodwin, PLC 10 Church Ave. SE Roanoke, VA 24001 804-415-7800

description:
At the law firm of ReidGoodwin, PLC, in Richmond, Virginia, we are fully committed to providing the highest level of advocacy and support possible to those who suffered an injury or loss on the job or as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Focusing primarily on personal injury and workers' compensation claims, the attorneys at our law firm serve plaintiff clients throughout the state, and we have earned a reputation as one of the top legal practices in the region for those adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Defective products
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Assault
  • Other preventable tragedies

Passionate about helping our clients obtain the justice they deserve and backed by our decades of combined legal experience, we have the skills and resources necessary to help you obtain the proper medical treatment you need as we fight hard to secure the full amount of compensation and benefits you deserve.

Recognized for our impeccable professionalism and exceptional customer service, our attorneys have received numerous awards and honors, including AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell. In addition, both The National Trial Lawyers organization and the Workers' Injury Law & Advocacy Group have voted our attorneys among the top in the country.

This means you can expect to receive the quality, comprehensive assistance and support you need from a local attorney you can trust. For more information on how ReidGoodwin, PLC, can best serve you and your family in your difficult and uncertain time, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
